mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (uid, upw, nm, pic) VALUES (#{uid}, #{upw}, #{nm}, #{pic})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, uid, upw, nm, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, email, pic FROM user WHERE uid=#{uid}
